name: After Detonation - Zombie Story
description:
After Detonation - Zombie Story is a game about survive in zombie apocalypse which is caused by a deadly chemical detonation. The player must collects anything can be found to survive, build shelters and weapons. This is a world without rules, the real winner is whom can stay to the last...

Hero 3D Model

"After Detonation Zombie Story" - Hero by Gordon Lee on Sketchfab

Engineer 3D Model

"After Detonation Zombie Story" - Engineer by Gordon Lee on Sketchfab

Zombie 3D Model

"After Detonation Zombie Story" - Zombie by Gordon Lee on Sketchfab

This game is still in developing. Download the Beta for Android. iOS version is on the way.

Game Design and Develop: Gordon Lee

Game Art: Gordon Lee

UX/UI: Gordon Lee

Sound & Effects: YouTube.com
